targets.rawSql:
SELECT a.utilization_rate*100
from oee.utilization_rate_day a,common.machine b
where to_char(a.insert_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(now(),'yyyy-MM-dd') and a.machine_id=(SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 0)

SELECT 
(case a.status_name
when 'Run' then 1
when 'Error' then 3
when 'Idle' then 0
when 'Off' then 2
else 6 end) as status
from oee.tricolor_tag_status a,common.machine b
where  a.machine_id=(SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 0) 
order by a.insert_time desc
limit 1

select '运行' as "状态",cast(CAST(duration_time as DECIMAL(13,2)) as varchar)||' min' as "累计时间"
from oee.tag_time_day 
where machine_id=(SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 0)  and status_name='Run'  and 
to_char(date,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(now(),'yyyy-MM-dd')
union all
select '异常' as "状态",cast(CAST(duration_time as DECIMAL(13,2)) as varchar)||' min' as "累计时间"
from oee.tag_time_day 
where machine_id=(SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 0)  and status_name='Error'  and 
to_char(date,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(now(),'yyyy-MM-dd')
union all
select '待机' as "状态",cast(CAST(duration_time as DECIMAL(13,2)) as varchar)||' min' as "累计时间"
from oee.tag_time_day 
where machine_id=(SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 0)  and status_name='Idle'  and 
to_char(date,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(now(),'yyyy-MM-dd')
union all
select '停机' as "状态",cast(CAST(duration_time as DECIMAL(13,2)) as varchar)||' min' as "累计时间"
from oee.tag_time_day 
where machine_id=(SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 0)  and status_name='Off'  and 
to_char(date,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(now(),'yyyy-MM-dd')

select '运行时间' as metric,b.duration_time as value,b.date as time
from oee.tag_time_day b
where  b.machine_id= (SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 0)  and b.status_name='Run'  and 
to_char(b.date,'yyyy-MM-dd')>=to_char(now()::timestamp+'-7 day','yyyy-MM-dd')
order by b.date

select '异常时间' as metric,b.duration_time as value,b.date as time
from oee.tag_time_day b
where  b.machine_id= (SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 0)  and b.status_name='Error'  and 
to_char(b.date,'yyyy-MM-dd')>=to_char(now()::timestamp+'-7 day','yyyy-MM-dd')
order by b.date

select '待机时间' as metric,b.duration_time as value,b.date as time
from oee.tag_time_day b
where  b.machine_id= (SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 0)  and b.status_name='Idel'  and 
to_char(b.date,'yyyy-MM-dd')>=to_char(now()::timestamp+'-7 day','yyyy-MM-dd')
order by b.date

select '停机时间' as metric,b.duration_time as value,b.date as time
from oee.tag_time_day b
where  b.machine_id= (SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 0)  and b.status_name='Off'  and 
to_char(b.date,'yyyy-MM-dd')>=to_char(now()::timestamp+'-7 day','yyyy-MM-dd')
order by b.date

select '稼动率' as metric,a.utilization_rate*100 as value,a.insert_time::timestamp as time
from oee.utilization_rate_day a
where a.machine_id=(SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 0)   and 
to_char(a.insert_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')>=to_char(now()+'-7 day','yyyy-MM-dd')
order by a.insert_time

SELECT a.duration_time
from oee.tricolor_tag_duration a,common.machine b
where to_char(a.insert_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(now(),'yyyy-MM-dd') and a.machine_id=(SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 0) 
order by a.insert_time desc
limit 1

SELECT a.utilization_rate*100
from oee.utilization_rate_day a
where to_char(a.insert_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(now(),'yyyy-MM-dd') and a.machine_id=(SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 1)

(case a.status_name
when 'Run' then 1

else 6 end) as status

select '运行时间' as metric,b.duration_time as value,b.date as time
from oee.tag_time_day b
where  b.machine_id= (SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 1)  and b.status_name='Run'  and 
to_char(b.date,'yyyy-MM-dd')>=to_char(now()::timestamp+'-7 day','yyyy-MM-dd')
order by b.date

select '稼动率' as metric,a.utilization_rate*100 as value,a.insert_time::timestamp as time
from oee.utilization_rate_day a,common.machine c
where a.machine_id=(SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 1) and 
to_char(a.insert_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')>=to_char(now()+'-7 day','yyyy-MM-dd')
order by a.insert_time

SELECT a.duration_time
from oee.tricolor_tag_duration a
where to_char(a.insert_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(now(),'yyyy-MM-dd') and a.machine_id=(SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 1)
order by a.insert_time desc
limit 1

from oee.utilization_rate_day a
where to_char(a.insert_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(now(),'yyyy-MM-dd') and a.machine_id=(SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 2)

SELECT 
(case a.status_name
when 'Run' then 1
when 'Error' then 3
when 'Idle' then 0
when 'Off' then 2
else 6 end) as status

to_char(date,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_char(now(),'yyyy-MM-dd')

select '运行时间' as metric,b.duration_time as value,a.insert_time::timestamp+'8 hour' as time
from oee.utilization_rate_day a,oee.status_duration_day b
where a.id=b.upper_id and a.machine_id=(SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 2)  and b.status_name='Run'  and 
to_char(a.insert_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')>=to_char(now()::timestamp+'-7 day','yyyy-MM-dd')
order by a.insert_time

select '异常时间' as metric,b.duration_time as value,a.insert_time::timestamp+'8 hour' as time
from oee.utilization_rate_day a,oee.status_duration_day b
where a.id=b.upper_id and a.machine_id=(SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 2) and b.status_name='Error'  and 
to_char(a.insert_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')>=to_char(now()::timestamp+'-7 day','yyyy-MM-dd')
order by a.insert_time

select '待机时间' as metric,b.duration_time as value,a.insert_time::timestamp+'8 hour' as time
from oee.utilization_rate_day a,oee.status_duration_day b,common.machine c
where a.id=b.upper_id and a.machine_id=(SELECT id from common.machine where area_node_id = (SELECT id from common.area_node where name_cn = '$area') order by id asc limit 1 offset 2) and b.status_name='Idle'  and 
to_char(a.insert_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')>=to_char(now()::timestamp+'-7 day','yyyy-MM-dd')
order by a.insert_time

list.definition: SELECT  b.name_cn  FROM common.area_layer a ,common.area_node b where  a.name_cn = '群组'  and  a.id = b.area_layer_id
list.label: 群组
list.name: group
list.query: SELECT  b.name_cn  FROM common.area_layer a ,common.area_node b where  a.name_cn = '群组'  and  a.id = b.area_layer_id

list.definition: SELECT  name_cn  FROM common.area_node  where  upper_id =( SELECT  id FROM common.area_node where name_cn = '$group')
list.label: 城市
list.name: area
list.query: SELECT  name_cn  FROM common.area_node  where  upper_id =( SELECT  id FROM common.area_node where name_cn = '$group')
